## QueryIndices.set() method

Set the Indices to use to filter a query.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(value: string | string[]): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | string \| string\[\] | A string or an array of strings representing Indices. |
